post.body: Yay! Good choice! :)
http://twitpic.com/tlqm how long can I keep these lights up do you think? Til monday?? Or Feb?? ha. Its just a strand on my fence
I definitely agree with you-over 11 instruments that man played-and was a master at them all. One of a kind.
hmm.. what can I say about this pic??? hmmm... well... hmm.... its rather interesting... :)
That will be the most wonderful gift. I should have known you were doing something like that. How special. :)
the one w/you holding the camera is cute. :)
Its nice, but kinda makes me dizzy.
writing down so much about Abby, so I won't forget-let me tell how great that was to do! Maybe u should do that-well more i mean
Oh its ok!!! Don't feel sad!!! What's even sadder is forgetting about them, and not being able to remember. I have started
haha, I will! Law suits are the American way of life. I'm surprised I haven't sued someone by now. :)
Fabulous-will go there one day. Prague is another place I just can't wait to see. I really just want to travel the world! :)
And it will probably be very weird for you-maybe always. But life must go on-and it should, its just hard.
Yeah it is hard, I know darling. Time will tell. I saw Jeff play w the band, he was good, but it was quite weird.
haha that is too funny! I thought I was pretty ADD, but you, my dear, far exceed me! :0)
So what is the rule about outside lights? I can't remember how long I left them up last year? My neighbors still have them on...
Sounds like a plan! I'm going over to my neighbors in a few, to help her with some stuff...I think I will bring over some wine :)
Yeah it happens.. I kinda have a problem with procrastination from time to time! There's always tomorrow! :)
Are you drinking?
I have like 200 channels but only because if I want sundance and IFC, I have to... Some day I would like to get rid of my tv's..
